name: Bottled It
description:
There's a hidden dimension to the plastic crisis: the impact on global climate. 

In this mini-game, you can easily get rid of plastics by clicking them away. What a wonderful reality that would be! #BRCGameJam 

Donate to the British Red Cross at https://tiltify.com/@cescag/game-jam-for-good-bottled-it

Find more about the British Red Cross and their work to support communities affected by climate change at https://www.redcross.org.uk/climate

--------

(Available to play in browser, not available on mobile unfortunately.)

First ever game by a newbie-developer/hobbyist with a passion for sustainability.

Original audio by David Feisst

Assets free from Polyhaven.com and Turbosquid.com
